archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0561
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a marketer, I want to be able to offer prospective and existing broadband subscription customers adding mobile subscriptions a multiple product discount that increases by X dollar for up to 4 mobile subscriptions.

properties.value: Discount based on amount of subscription a customer has (one payer/family). Can be also group of customers.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
